description.tchinese: 已通關全部異傳

description.english: Defeated 5,000 enemies.
description.tchinese: 累計擊敗數已達5000
description.japanese: 累計撃破数が5000になった

description.english: Used Affinity Techniques 200 times.
description.tchinese: 已發動共鳴絕技200次

description.english: Defeated a monster for the first time.
description.tchinese: 首次擊敗妖魔

description.tchinese: 首次擊敗大妖魔
description.japanese: 初めて大怪異を撃破した

description.english: Defeated a Servant for the first time.
description.tchinese: 首次戰勝從者

description.english: Won a Battle Recollection for the first time.
description.schinese: 首次在回想战斗中取胜
description.tchinese: 首次於回想戰鬥中獲勝
description.japanese: 初めて回想戦闘で勝利した

description.english: Learned all stances.
description.tchinese: 已習得所有架式
description.japanese: すべての型を習得した

description.tchinese: 已達二天一流的奧義
description.japanese: 二天一流の奥義に到達した

description.tchinese: 已習得所有合作招式

description.tchinese: 已習得所有魔術
description.japanese: すべての魔術を習得した

description.tchinese: 已習得Saber的全部技能
description.japanese: セイバーのスキルをすべて習得した

description.english: Got Saber excited 50 times.
description.tchinese: 讓Saber感到興奮50次
description.japanese: セイバーを50回ワクワクさせた

description.english: Purchased all types of food available at food stalls.

description.schinese: 与所有无主从者缔结真正同盟

description.tchinese: 攻下靈地達500次
